title: "Game still in progress..."???
body: I started a TFT game, and, the client changed to "Game is still in progress..."  But no game ever showed up.  I closed the client, restarted it, and got the same thing.  I don't even get the chance to no connect, since it doesn't even let me try.

replies.body: I had to uninstall my game and redownload it for it to work!
Restarting fixed the problem for me, too.
This bug has been here since 2 months ago. Still not fixed, had to restart my computer in order for the screen to pop up and which by the time I already lost.
